    com.example.card_management_system - package com.example.card_management_system
    Root package of the Card Management System application.
    com.example.card_management_system.config - package com.example.card_management_system.config
    Contains configuration classes for the Card Management System, including application setup, beans, and other context-related components.
    com.example.card_management_system.controller - package com.example.card_management_system.controller
    Contains REST controllers that handle incoming API requests.
    com.example.card_management_system.dto - package com.example.card_management_system.dto
    Contains Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) used to transfer data between service layers.
    com.example.card_management_system.model - package com.example.card_management_system.model
    Contains entity classes representing core domain models, such as User, Card, Transaction, and BlockCardRequest.
    com.example.card_management_system.repository - package com.example.card_management_system.repository
    Contains repository interfaces for data access using Spring Data JPA.
    com.example.card_management_system.security - package com.example.card_management_system.security
    Contains classes related to application security, such as authentication, JWT token handling, and password encoding.
    com.example.card_management_system.service - package com.example.card_management_system.service
    Contains service classes that implement the business logic of the Card Management System.
    com.example.card_management_system.util - package com.example.card_management_system.util
    Contains utility and helper classes used across the application, such as encryption or formatting tools.
